column2: CLPS, Inc. operates as a holding company. The company is headquartered in Shanghai, Shanghai. The firm is focused on delivering services to global institutions in banking, insurance and financial sectors, both in China and globally. The firm conducts its businesses mainly through three segments, including Fintech IT Consulting Service segment, Customized IT Solution Service segment and Other segment. The Companyâ€™s consulting services include credit card services and core banking services. The company offers IT consulting services across various credit card business areas, including credit card applications, account setup, authorization and activation, settlement, collection, promotion, point system, anti-fraud, statement, reporting and risk management. The firm conducts its businesses in domestic and overseas markets.
